title: Predicting Biodegradable Zinc Alloy Properties: Machine Learning and Real-Time Visualization Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic materials engineering and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical competency in biodegradable metal material design for real-world applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correlation between mechanical/chemical properties of biodegradable zinc alloys and machine learning models.
Learners can perform alloy composition design and property prediction processes using provided databases and visualization interfaces.
Learners can analyze prediction accuracy and propose improvement strategies for real-world cases (Zn-Mn-based alloys) through project-based assessments

resources: Alloy Property Measurement Experimental Equipment (Virtual Simulation)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
